name: Proton Project
tagline: The Essentials Knock-off made with Skript
body:
### What is Proton?
**Proton** is a project started by Vexio, made to re-create **Essentials**, with **Skript**. Skript is a custom *Minecraft* coding Language created by Njolbrim. You can find more information (here)[https://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/]

### What are the additions to Proton?
The additions, or *addons*, for **Proton** are **Neutron** & **Electron**. Both have there own separate features that *Proton* does not contain.

### What is Neutron?
**Neutron** is the chat addon for *Proton*. *Neutron* is set to be an extremely simple & customizable chat plugin, integrated with *Proton*. *Neutron* will contain features such as changing a group's prefix, suffix, chat color, etc.

### What is Electron?
**Electron** at the moment does currently have a *solid* use. Currently, I am trying to think of a use for it; because I really would like to use all atomic particles used in making up an atom.

### How do I download & install Proton?
Installing **The Proton Project** on to your server is quite simple. To start, you will need to have installed (Skript)[https://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/] on your server. After so, restart your server. After restarting, download & extract *proton.sk*, and the other specified addons you chose, into the directory of `plugins/Skript/scripts/`. After that, restart your server!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
